item.title: [HADOOP-10337] ConcurrentModificationException from MetricsDynamicMBeanBase.createMBeanInfo()

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: From ConcurrentHashMap Javadoc: "The view's iterator is a "weakly consistent" iterator that will never throw ConcurrentModificationException, and guarantees to traverse elements as they existed upon construction of the iterator"
